posts.content:
Hi All,

Please see following list of part I have for sale:

2 Wolfsburg West Complete Front Wheel Arches for Splitscreen 1955-1962 (they have been drilled for temp fixing and have been temporarily tack welded) : SOLD

O/S Right Cab Door from my 1957 Kombi : £350 ono

Rear Hatch (No Crescent) Tailgate from my 1957 Kombi (has been dipped and red oxide primed, needs work to the lower panel and a new piano hinge. I have a new outer panel and the old piano hinge to be included) : £125 ono

O/S long panel for RHD Splitscreen (red oxide primed. bought for my Kombi, however it doesn’t quite fit. Could be adjusted to fit or cut up for the vents, fuel opening etc) : £75 ono

Preferably Collection from PL24 postcode, however I’m happy to courier if required. I do work in Bristol on a monthly basis, so could deliver if you are located en route/nearby.

All items are on eBay with photos and more info, my seller ID : ciamint88

Any questions, please let me know.

Clint

All,

Prices have been reviewed as I want to get these gone.

Offers accepted.

Thanks

All,

I am open to offers and would like them gone.

Clint

Hi All,

Some parts sold, list updated.

Given current situation, I’m happy to assist with courier etc.

Let me know. I am open to offers.

Thanks

Hi Clint, Is the yellow door still available? I'm looking for the off side for my 62 crew Cab but not sure if that is the same. I can check this but wanted to know first if its still available.

Cheers Chris
